subject: New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: George Spitz, the often overlooked inspiration behind the New York City Marathon’s move from Central Park to the city’s streets, will be inducted into the New York Road Runners Hall of Fame on Oct. 30.
snippet: George Spitz, the often overlooked inspiration behind the New York City Marathon’s move from Central Park to the city’s streets, will be inducted into the New York Road Runners Hall of Fame on Oct. 30.
